comments: It appears that a(n) is the number of (n+11)-digit fixed points under the base-7 Kaprekar map A165071 (see A165075 for the list of fixed points). [From _Joseph Myers_, Sep 04 2009]
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 225
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,0,-1,0,0,0,0,1,0,-2,0,1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
